name: Akshay Gupta
message: Hi folks! I'm Akshay (President, Class of 2016). Currently based out of Seattle, working as an engineer on the Risk & Fraud team at Plaid. Hmu if you're in / visiting Seattle, working in the risk & fraud space or generally want to catch up!

name: Vishesh Balani
message: Hi everyone! I‚Äôm Vishesh Balani, Class of 2015. I moved to Chicago/Evanston 3 days ago to pursue my MBA and will be calling it home for the next 2 years. Prior to the move, I‚Äôve worked as a product manager in e-commerce and in consulting. Excited to reconnect with all of you!

name: Shubhaankar
message: Hello everyone! I'm Shubhaankar, head of ML in the batch of 2023. I'm currently a rising 2nd year at UChicago double majoring in CS and Statistics. I'm also pursuing research in machine learning - computer vision, and LLMs, and some quantitative applications in finance. Excited to connect with you all!

name: Kunal Kapila
message: Hi All, I‚Äôm Kunal Kapila. (One of the) Head of Programming from the RKP class of 2014. Currently based out of London. I work at a FinTech firm as a software engineer. name: Aman Gupta
message: Hi All! This is Aman Gupta, Class of 2001. I have had academic training in Engineering, Management, and Law. Worked for a few years in the financial sector, a couple doing a StartUp, and now am in government service with my present posting at Port Blair (albeit my permanent base is in Delhi). I am still open to trying out a few ideas but get stuck in not having a good tech partner. I would be happy to connect with those in Delhi who may have the bandwidth and inclination to explore. Regards

message: Hey everyone, I‚Äôm Sahil - class of 2009. Currently based in Oslo! üá≥üá¥

name: Mohit Sharma
message: Hey everyone! I am Mohit Sharma, Vice President from 2014 batch. I am currently based in Bangalore, working as a Software Engineering Manager at Amazon Payments. Feeling really nostalgic going through the messages and super excited for connecting with all of you ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Shantanu Chhabra
message: Hi all, I‚Äôm Shantanu Chhabra. Graduated RKP in 2014. Currently in Seattle, but moving to the bay area soon. I work at Apple where I lead the OS Intelligence team. I‚Äôm hiring ML Engineers for my team ‚Äî hmu if you know anyone.

name: Rohit Garg
message: Hi, I‚Äôm Rohit (aka RG). ‚Äò07 grad. I live in Seattle, working on my own thing now. Most recently at Google but I quit on April 1st after the Gmail anniversary triggered my mid-life crisis.

name: Karmanya Singh
message: Hi all, Karmanya here! Batch of 2015. I did my electrical engineering from Imperial. Came back to India in 2020 and started Kommit - kommit.com - we started as a patent consulting firm but now do many other things too. I also work with NotarEase (notarease.com) - a legal-tech startup doing online notarisations. Actively involved in Kabaddi - especially England Kabaddi (englandkabaddi.com) Based in Delhi. Happy to catch up!!

name: Tanay Vardhan
message: Hey everyone! I'm Tanay, graduated in 2015. I live in Toronto, working at PayPal as a software engineer. Great to meet you all!

name: Naman Dhingra
message: Hey!! I'm Naman, Exun 2019-20. Just finished my undergrad at NSUT and have started as a Product Engineer at Sprinklr in Gurgaon. Seeing all the introductions and names brought back so many amazing memories. So happy to reconnect!

name: Somesh Kar

name: Tushit

Extremely grateful to be here and I look forward to learning a lot from you all!

name: Shashwat Goel

name: Rajat Sodhi
message: Hello, this Is Rajat, I graduated 1999 batch. I am an architect and live in New Delhi. Currently I am a Professor teaching Design at Sushant University in Gurugram. My work is based around the field of biomimicry - using algorithms and computational design to mimic natural phenomenon and use that to create architectural form. I‚Äôve built 3D printers and research robotic fabrication. Also a part time carpenter and happy to be here :)

name: Manas
